data.title: John C. McManus, Sr.

data.text:
John C. McManus, Sr., age 75, of Grindstone, passed away Tuesday, December 7, 2004, in Uniontown Hospital. He was born April 18, 1929, in Ralph, Pa., son of the late Joseph and Viola Grimm McManus.

In addition to his parents, he was predeceased by his brothers, Roger McManus and Charles McManus; and his sister, Edna Rozak.

John was a retired driver for Matlack Trucking with 25 years of service. He was a veteran of the Korean Conflict, and a member of V.F.W. Post 47 in Uniontown.

He is survived by his wife, Barbara Kroschinsky McManus; sons, John C. McManus, Jr. and wife Christine of Arlington, Va. and Robert O. McManus and wife Elizabeth of Fairchance; three grandchildren, Shanna Marie McManus, Jacob Calvin McManus and Nicholas Kyle McManus; brothers, Duane McManus and wife Marylou of Republic, Robert McManus and wife Carol of Cleveland, Ohio; and his sister Marlene Wellington of Searights.

Friends will be received in DEARTH FUNERAL HOME, New Salem, Friday, Dec. 10, 2004, from 2o to 4 and 7 to 8:30 p.m., the hour of service, with the Rev. Roland M. O’Brien officiating. Interment will be held at the convenience of John’s family.
